Mobile technologies use a form of a platform where many transmitters have the ability to send more data at the same time on a single communication channel. Since multiple channels are transmitted this platform is also called as code division multiple access technique. This platform is also useful for many users to make use of single frequency and this restrict the likelihood of interference of frequencies which comes from two or more sources. This mobile technology is rapidly becoming higher over the years since this is mainly used for communication purposes. Mobile technology has become more and more popular through tablet and portable computers.
